text: is a Japanese video game designer. He was born in Tokyo. Iwatani is best known as the creator of the arcade games Pac-Man (1980) and Pole Position (1982). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Detailed Toru Iwatani biography at PAC- MAN Museum * Q&A;: Pac-Man Creator Reflects on 30 Years of Dot-Eating at Wired.com Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese video game designers Category:Pac-Man Category:People from Tokyo
title: Toru Iwatani
